note: Curious old guy with PhD in experimental physics. Jack of many trades, master of few. Mostly harmless.

name: Work
value: I earn my living by trying to improve Crisis/Disaster management planning and response. Including, but not limited to climate change adaptation and mitigation.

name: Society
value: I have a very strong opinion on societal issues, including but not limited to democracy, politics, economy and the human rights.

name: Private life
value: I do have a life. It's not extremely private.

name: Hobbies
value: Biking, hiking, skiing, reading, DIY, sustainable gardening, music, problem solving.  Sometimes intensively, sometimes less so.
